original_text: When someone makes a strong promise, he uses the authority of a person who is greater than himself. This shows that he will certainly obey his promise. Then nobody can argue about it.
korean_text: 사람들은 자기보다 더 큰 자를 가리켜 맹세하나니 맹세는 그들이 다투는 모든 일의 최후 확정이니라

sentences.original_text: When someone makes a strong promise
he uses the authority of a person
This shows that he will certainly obey his promise
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 그가 반드시 자신의 약속을 지킬 것임을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: Then nobody can argue about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 아무도 그것에 대해 논쟁할 수 없습니다
